text: Write the code as if it will be accompanied by a violent psychopath who knows where you live

text: The complexity of the program grows until it exceeds the abilities of the programmer

text: Programming today is a race of software developers striving to write programs with greater and better idiotic stability, and a universe that is trying to create more selected idiots. While the universe is winning.

text: Chatter costs nothing. Show me the code.

text: Sometimes it's better to stay at home on Monday than spend the whole week debugging code written on Monday.
